### Cleaning Services – La Macaza Institution

[** solicitationNumber **]{.underline} : 21301-24-4310585
[** solicitationPublicationDate **]{.underline} : 2023-02-24
[**tenderClosingDate**]{.underline} : 2023-03-10T14:00:00
[**procurementMethod**]{.underline} : Competitive - Open bidding

**Description and Summary**

The Correctional Service of Canada is seeking to procure the services of a contractor to provide cleaning services at La Macaza Institution. The contractor will provide the necessary labour to perform cleaning services at the institution.

**Statement of Work (SOW)**

- **Objective** : The contractor must provide the labour to perform cleaning services at La Macaza Institution.
- **Deliverables** : The contractor must provide cleaning services for the areas and at the frequency indicated in Annex A (statement of work). The contractor must provide maintenance supplies and the labour required to perform the cleaning services.

**Tender Details**

- **Trade Agreement** : Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), World Trade Organisation-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Canada Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), and other agreements listed.
- **Estimated Quantity** : Consult the solicitation document statement of work and basis of payment.
- **DURATION** : The duration of the standing offer is from the date of award to March 31st, 2024, with the option to renew for two (2) additional one-year periods.

**Eligibility Criteria**

- **Bidders** : All interested suppliers can submit a bid.
- **Evaluation Criteria** : Lowest priced compliant bid.
- **Security Requirements** : This standing offer includes security requirements.

**Additional Information**

- **Buyandsell.gc.ca** : Bidders can obtain the complete statement of work and evaluation criteria by downloading the solicitation document and associated documents from Buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.
- **Procurement Assistance Canada (PAC)** : PAC offers seminars to businesses interested in learning how to sell goods and services to the Government of Canada.
- **Disclaimer** : The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Allocation Documents**

- [**Attachments English**]{.underline} : https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/24
